resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/74356</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74356</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>3c561de3-27bf-480c-9713-b9b6dee14a60#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Leképezés homorú tükörrel</string>
            <string language="en">Forming concav mirror</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Formung des concav Spiegels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formation du miroir de concav</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dando forma ao espelho do concav</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formare lo specchio del concav</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαμόρφωση concav του καθρέφτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación del espejo del concav</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A képen látható a gyertya a tükör és a gyertya fordított állású képe</string>
            <string language="en">You can see the candle the mirror and the image of the upside down candle</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">homorú tükör,  képalkotás,  </string>
            <string language="en">concav mirror, image forming,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sie können die Kerze unten sehen der Spiegel und
das Bild der Oberseite durchzuleuchten</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vous pouvez voir la bougie le miroir et l'image 
de la bougie à l'envers</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Você pode ver a vela o espelho e a imagem da 
vela de cabeça para baixo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Potete vedere la candela lo specchio e l'immagine
della candela inversa</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μπορείτε να δείτε το κερί ο καθρέφτης και η 
εικόνα του ανάποδου κεριού</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usted puede ver la vela el espejo y la imagen de 
la vela al revés</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">concav Spiegel, bildendes Bild,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">miroir de concav, image formant,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">espelho do concav, imagem que dá forma,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">specchio del concav, immagine che forma,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">concav καθρέφτης, εικόνα που διαμορφώνει,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">espejo del concav, imagen que forma,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:
org:IBCnet Magyarország Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>978</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>74356</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=3c561de3-27bf-480c-9713-b9b6dee14a60&v=1&b=2</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
